name: Jumbo Jet Pilot
overview: Jumbo Jet Pilot is a flight simulator game, showing how to manoeuvre a massive passenger aircraft - Boeing 747 200B. The perspective is presented as a pilot's cockpit view with all the typical information. The player may use all standard aircraft features, such as increase/decrease throttle, brakes on/off, landing lights, undercarriage raise/lower, advanced map position. The game allows to train day and night flights.
